### Read empirical tree files
```{r}
pathfiles <- here("Data", "Movement", "Resource-trees")
trees_to_dfs <- list.files(pathfiles, pattern = ".csv")
unwanted <- list.files(pathfiles, pattern = "all.csv")
trees_to_dfs <- base::setdiff(trees_to_dfs, unwanted) #https://stackoverflow.com/questions/31590730/list-files-in-r-that-do-not-match-a-pattern

i <- 1
for (tf in trees_to_dfs) {
  
  tf <- trees_to_dfs[i]
  tf_csv <- paste0(pathfiles, "/", tf)
  
  if (i == 1) {
    trees <- readr::read_csv(tf_csv)
  }
  
  trees <- dplyr::bind_rows(trees, trees)
  
  i <- i + 1
}

```
